Venue

  • Home
  • Venue
  • Suwon Convention Center

Suwon Convention Center

The venue for the ‘25 Suwon ITS Asia-Pacific Forum’

The exterior of Suwon Convention Center

Facility Overview

3F Convention Hall (3,000 seats, divisible into 3 areas), Meeting Room

  • Convention Hall
  • 301+302, 304-306
  • 3F VIP Room
  • 3F Lobby

2F Meeting Room

  • 201
  • 202-207
  • 2F VIP Room
  • 2F Lobby

1F Exhibition Hall, 1-4F Meeting Room (28 mid or small size rooms in total)

  • Exhibition Hall
  • 101-107, 401-408
  • 5F VIP Dining Room
  • B1 Event Hall

Getting Here

Suwon Convention Center Address

140, Gwanggyojungang-ro, Yeongtong-gu, Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do, 16514, Republic of Korea

지도 API

By Subway

「Gwanggyo Jungang(Ajou Univ.) Station」, Sinbundang Line

  • Get off Gwanggyo Jungang Station(Exit 4)
  • Walk to Suwon Convention Center(Approx. 10 minutes on foot)

By Bus

Express Bus Stop: 「Gwanggyo Jungang·Ajou University Transfer Center」

  • Seoul Station M5115, M5121 / Gangnam Station M5422
  • Get off at Gwanggyo Jungang·Ajou University Transfer Center(Exit 4) Walk to Suwon Convention Center(Approx. 10 minutes on foot)

Intra-city Bus Stop : 「Suwon Convention Center · Lotte Outlet」

  • 5-4, 19, 20, 32, 32-3, 32-4, 670, 720-3, 999
  • Get off at Suwon Convention Center · Lotte Outlet Walk to Suwon Convention Center (Approx. 3 minutes on foot)

By Airport Limousine Bus

Incheon International Airport : Airport limousine bus for 「Gwanggyo Jungang·Ajou University Transfer Center」

  • Take Bus No. 8877(60~80 minutes)
  • Get off at Gwanggyo Jungang· Ajou Daeyeok Transfer Center(Exit 4)
  • Suwon Convention Center(Approx. 10 minutes on foot)

Gimpo International Airport : Intercity Bus for 「Dongsuwon Station」

  • Take Bus No. A4300(80min)
  • Get off at Dongsuwon Station
  • Take a taxi(10min) or take a bus(30min)
  • Suwon Convention Center

By Car

Seoul Station

    • Bongdam Dosi Gosokhwa Road
    • Yeongdong Expressway
    • Gwanggyo Jungang Station(60min, 40km)
    • Gyeongbu Expressway
    • Anyangpangyo-ro
    • Yongin Seoul Expressway
    • Gwanggyo Jungang Station(70min, 41km)

Gangnam Station

    • Gyeongbu Expressway
    • Anyangpangyo-ro
    • Yongin Seoul Expressway
    • Gwanggyo Jungang Station(48min, 32km)
    • Umyeonsallo
    • Gwacheon Bongdam Dosi Gosokhwa Road
    • Yeongdong Expressway
    • Gwanggyo Jungang Station(44min, 24km)
